law.catch_line: Except as provided by the Secretary, a person may not keep poultry unless the poultry is registered ...

text.section: Except as provided by the Secretary, a person may not keep poultry unless the poultry is registered with the Secretary.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the Secretary shall maintain a person's registration record filed under subsection (b) of this section in a manner that protects the identity of the registrant.

If the Secretary, after consultation with the Secretary of Health and Mental Hygiene, determines that the disclosure is necessary to protect the public health or prevent the spread of an infectious or contagious disease, the Secretary may disclose identifying information.
